turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, I'm starving. I want to order some food, but I'm completely blanking on what I want. Any suggestions?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I can help with that! To give you the best recommendations, could you tell me what kind of cuisine you're in the mood for? Or perhaps any dietary restrictions or preferences you might have?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm, good question. I'm trying to eat a bit healthier, so something with lots of veggies would be great. I guess Italian or Mediterranean would work?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I understand. I recommend 'Mediterranean Delights'. They have excellent reviews for their grilled vegetable platters and lentil soup. Alternatively, 'Luigi's Italian' offers a whole wheat pasta primavera that's also quite popular.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, I had Luigi's last week. It was so-so. Mediterranean Delights sounds good, but are their portions huge? I hate wasting food.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Many users mention that the portions at Mediterranean Delights are generous but not overly large. A good option to avoid food waste would be to order a smaller dish or consider saving leftovers for later. Is there anything else I can help you with?
